name: Eslander
description:
In Eslander, you feel the atmosphere of a captain taking control of his own crew and ship in an attempt to save his own look and the whole galaxy from the tyranny of the other 5 enemy factions.


This is a very dangerous mission! With each meeting you'll be presented with a unique challenge with many possible solutions. What will you do to stop incoming rockets from destroying your shields, or when there's a hole in your ship and oxygen is leaking out?

This "spacecraft simulation" allows you to take your ship and crew onto a large adventure through a galaxy with many secrets. Filled with glory and bitter defeat.

Choose between 6 factions around the Galaxy.
Go through all the difficulties of being a spacecraft captain. Follow the commanders' tasks at the space stations. Follow the whole story of Eslander's galaxy.

Try your captain skills against other players. Buy the latest and most powerful weapons and destroy them with one click.

Do you want to acquire new weapons and a new ship? No problem! You have a chance to get them after you sell the resources you have earned. Now you can get resources from asteroids and sell them in space stations. Each asteroid has a production time and a selling price.

Looking for something different and hidden over the centuries? Why not try exploring a planet? Maybe you'll find what you're looking for.

Manage the flow of energy in your ship. You need to strengthen the shield, but do not you have the energy. What do you do?

You have a ship, but you must have a crew to manage it. Every member of your crew needs a salary, so watch out for resources to keep your crew happy. Do not have money? Then your crew will leave you.


See you soon Captain!
Discover more options and ways to deal with the war in the universe of Eslander
